br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector
Class NCLCompoundAction<A extends NCLAction,P extends NCLConnectorParam>

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      br.uff.midiacom.ana.NCLElement
          br.uff.midiacom.ana.connector.NCLCompoundAction<A,P>
All Implemented Interfaces:
NCLAction<A,P>, Element, java.lang.Comparable<A>, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class NCLCompoundAction<A extends NCLAction,P extends NCLConnectorParam>
extends NCLElement
implements NCLAction<A,P>

Esta classe define o elemento compoundAction da Nested Context Language (NCL). Este elemento é o elemento que define uma ação composta de um conector de um documento NCL.

See Also:
ABNT NBR 15606-2:2007
